title: MPH: Doubts over 'science project' 2026 F1 cars are not going away
summary: As more drivers get a feel for the 2026 Formula 1 cars in simulators, concern is growing that the new regulations may sacrifice driving enjoyment in pursuit of technical ambition, asMark Hughesreports

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary focus of the new regulations for the 2026 Formula 1 cars?
What are drivers currently testing in relation to the 2026 Formula 1 season?
What concern is being expressed by drivers about the 2026 F1 cars?
